channel.title: General Reading Vinge Simmons Fantasy on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Reading Vinge Simmons Fantasy on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: last night.
item.description: So yesterday i got up rather late ~ like 3pm. That isn’t really unusual. I usually get up quite late on saturdays. I was thinking that i have maybe not “wasted” a saturday to sleep 50 times in the last 5 years. I enjoy it. i feel that it is some of the only time i have JUST to myself. sleep. hah. and i am always in a constant state of sleep dep - that it is helpful.
